p.s: The problem with reviving a relationshop or relationships in general is that it involves two parties.
Gatsby missed out on living his life to build up a new reality just to win back Daisy.
Daisy on the other hand did not waste time waiting for him and built herself a life with a rich husband and a child.
Now, if Gatsby wants to revive their relationship would have to give up the savetysafety of the life she built for their love.
But because she moved on and views him as a memory it seems like love was not enough for her as a reason to do without wealth and the pursuit of materialistic things, which Tom could offer her.

On the other hand, Daisy, who admires materialism, might see being weathywealthy with Gatsby and loved by him as reason enough, so she could get the best of both worlds since her marriage with Tom does not involve much love.
In general, reviving a past relationship could turn into a happy ending love story if both are still in love with the other and have not moved on with their lives.
Although a problem is that you forget to live in the moment by living in the past.
You miss out living your life to the fullest especially when you, as Gatsby, live a life of pretend.
